content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Remember to also check the websites of restaurants that interest you, as they often have sections dedicated to private dining or group events. You can also give them a call or send an email to inquire about their private dining options and availability.

Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further assistance. Good luck with your search, and I hope you find the perfect venue for your college reunion!

Remember to also consider factors like parking, ambiance, and menu options when choosing a restaurant. And don't forget to ask about any special deals or packages they might offer for groups.

Have fun planning your reunion, and I'm sure you'll have a blast catching up with your friends!
